Articles.Content:
Who wants to fly to **Duna** in style? Well, not in style, but with a challenge.

Well, I want to see who could go to the mun in fastest time possible. Here are the rules:

Rules

  • You cannot use cheats
  • You can only use two rockets (one per stage), one RCS fuel tank, 4 RCS rocket propellants, one crew member, two decouplers, one comand pod, no landing gears, one parachute, and two fuel tanks.
  • You have to fly into orbit of Kerbin, then fly to **Duna**, land, plant a flag, and fly back.
  • The one who does this the fastest wins.
  • You can post screanshots (one at the beginning, one in space, one on **Duna**, and one landing down on to Kerbin) or take a video.
  • Have fun!:D:D:D:sticktongue:

**Update**

Edited October 14, 2014 by JuliusCeaser
Mun is too easy planet, so I choosed DUNA.
It breaks a few rules (landing gears, the orbit thing and the flag), but it can serve as an inspiration for the people that want to enter this challenge.

This is a fairly common challenge, but one that isn't often updated when we get a new version!

And be aware, some people don't count modded engines as cheating...
